name: Luck! Really?
description:
Luck! Really? Is there something called luck?

Chance Based Games. Are these really based on chance?

Experience Chance based games that are not really based on chance. Can you determine the exact outcome of the CPU in every turn? It is possible! Play for High Scores in the Endless Fun!

Submitted MiniLD #70 : Determinism
